detail_desc: Scarf in a soft, rib-knit wool blend containing some cashmere. Size 45x250 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins) and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a low crotch, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, back pockets and ribbed hems.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Skirt in a fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliqués. Unlined.

Long jacket in a rustle weave with a small stand-up collar and detachable, double-layered hood with ties at the front. Zip down the front, a wind flap with press-studs at the top and hem, front pockets and a loose yoke at the back. Long sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Ankle-length, pleated skirt in an airy, patterned weave with a high waist with covered elastication and a wrapover front. Short jersey inner skirt.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery tulle bow at the top.
Long, pleated dress in satin with a sheen. Draped, wrapover top section, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side, seam under the bust and flared skirt. Lined.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated, ribbed waistband, fake side pockets, flap leg pockets and ribbed hems.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short necklace with a metal and plastic chain. Adjustable length, 40-48 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Small, quilted imitation leather shoulder bag with a zip at the top, one inner compartment and a metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 3x17x24cm.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with appliqués. Zip fly and button and raw-edge hems.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom at the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Mesh trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive motif, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.

Studio Collection. Blouse in an airy, patterned, softly draping weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered, partially loose yoke at the front. Long, wide sleeves with gathered shoulder seams for added volume and closer-fitting, buttoned cuffs. Relaxed fit with slits in the sides. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.

Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder, a seam at the hips and a jersey-lined skirt in glittery tulle.
High-waisted, calf-length skirt in chiffon with double pleats at the top, a sewn-in tie belt, concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Large earrings in metal and plastic. Length 6 cm.
Off-the-shoulder top in textured jersey with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the hem.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, paper bag waist with a tie belt. Zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Round neckline, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Top in airy chiffon in a double layer at the front with a V-neck, racer back, lace trims at the top and an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide, fabric-covered Alice band with a knot detail on the top.
Fancy dress costume with a skirt and butterfly wings in rainbow colours. Glittery skirt in several layers of tulle with an elastic waistband. Wings with elastic shoulder straps.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a polo neck. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut shirt in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Soft scarf in an airy viscose weave with fringe trims all round. Size 90x200 cm.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated, patterned weave with a visible, ribbed elastic waistband. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft modal jersey with a deep V-neck at the back and a straight-cut hem.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a shaped neckline that has gathers at the top and is elasticated at the back. Long sleeves with elastication at the top and cuffs, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch, matt silk cotton twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Treggings in soft, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Satin-covered Alice band with lace cat ears on top.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.
Cap in cotton twill with elastication at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch. One with an all-over print and two ribbed.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a lace yoke and shoulders, a tie at the back of the neck and cap sleeves. Gathers at the sides for best fit. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Long metal earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Length 8 cm.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a twisted detail and small opening at the front. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem. Light support.
Straight-cut blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with ties and smocking at the cuffs.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood with a decorative drawstring. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a chin guard at the top. Chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with worn details. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless top in a soft knit with a V-neck front and back and a roll-edge hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off hems.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow, double shoulder straps, a ventilating mesh section at the front, a mesh racer back and elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide elastication at the waist and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Jumper in a soft rib-knit with a hole-knit sections at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shirt jacket in soft cotton flannel with a collar and press-studs down the front. Open chest pockets, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides.
Short skirt in soft twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fully lined, ribbed, shimmering metallic bikini. Top with a plastic fastener at the back.

Pinstriped trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.
Joggers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and cuffed hems. Zipped side pockets and two back pockets, one with a zip.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a lace-covered yoke at the front, a button placket and decorative gathers at the front. Long puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill for maximum mobility. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Short dress in an airy weave with a wide, elasticated neckline, long raglan sleeves, elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Pool shoes with a padded foot strap and moulded soles that are fluted underneath.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with studs, open sides, an adjustable tab with elastication and a metal fastener, and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Boxy-style top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn in turn-ups.
Bomber jacket in airy satin with a ribbed collar, zip down the front, side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a drawstring hem. Unlined.
